description_html:
The prometheus cocoon a fixture that made from thin sliced bended natural marble/ onix , its planted with dimmable 0-10 volt, 3000k LED strip , it match with Lutron or crestron dimming system.
When its on it appears like flaming cocoon , its an exotic fixture with size of 2,75 metre length , 0,8 height, hung with thin 2mm steel rod at 5-6 point to enhance the elegance look as centre piece
